greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors of n minus the sum of prime indices of n.
comment: A prime index of n is a number m such that prime(m) divides n. The multiset of prime indices of n is row n of A112798, with sum A056239(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: A056239(n) = { my(f); if(1==n, 0, f=factor(n); sum(i=1, #f~, f[i,2] * primepi(f[i,1]))); }
xref: Positions of positive terms are A325795.
Positions of nonnegative terms are A325796.
Positions of negative terms are A325797.
Positions of nonpositive terms are A325798.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, May 23 2019
